paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses genetic variants associated with breast cancer in Polish women, focusing on low-penetrance SNPs. No specific BRCA2 variants were reported in the study population.

tables_processed.table_caption: Mutations detected in the selected regions of BRCA1 gene among study participants
The significant SNP associations with breast cancer considering allelic and Cochran-Armitage trend tests

challenges: No BRCA2 variants were reported in the study population.
extraction_metadata.notes: The study focused on SNPs associated with breast cancer risk, but no specific BRCA2 variants were identified in the participants.
